body_html: I don't work at Google anymore, so I'm out of normal bug fix rotation. However, I also don't think this issue is a good fit for TensorFlow. It might make sense in a separate library, but fundamentally nearly all graphs won't have closed form inverses, so one usually wants something iterative.

body: I don't work at Google anymore, so I'm out of normal bug fix rotation.  However, I also don't think this issue is a good fit for TensorFlow.  It might make sense in a separate library, but fundamentally nearly all graphs won't have closed form inverses, so one usually wants something iterative.
